channel.title: Version Control on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Version Control on Mark Needham

item.title: Mercurial: Pulling from behind a proxy
item.description: I’ve been playing around with Mercurial and the mercurial hosting website bitbucket a bit this year and recently wanted to pull from a repository from behind a proxy server. With a bit of help from the mercurial mailing list and the documentation this is how I was able to pull the repository for the Hambread project I’ve been doing a bit of work on: ~~~text hg –config http_proxy.host=ipOfYourProxyServer:portOfYourProxyServer –config http_proxy.user=user –config http_proxy.
